location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Hubert Isaak Walton

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the cable house which he will write to Tehran about and asking that he send public political news regularly from Kurrachee [Karachi] as he has not heard anything of the latest troubles in Europe and the only news received have been the market rates for cotton as there is no Reuters agent there.
